name: List Group - Item Disabled
heading: list-group-item disabled
snippet:
• Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
usage: Add .disabled to a .list-group-item to make it appear disabled. Note that some elements with .disabled will also require custom JavaScript to fully disable their click events (e.g., links).
description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. Modify and extend them to support just about any content within.
